pullRequest.title: Rebalance MP Config FAT buckets
pullRequest.bodyText:
Rebalance MP Config FATs between the different modes, config versions and EE versions;
LITE and FULL
MP Config 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, 1.4 and 2.0
EE7 and EE8
Also refactor some tests to run all in the same instance of a server to avoid additional server restarts.
